scripts.test:prepare:markets: mustache config/markets/networks/mainnet.json config/markets/subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/markets/networks/mainnet.json config/markets/constants.template.ts > src/constants/static.ts && mustache config/markets/metadata.json config/markets/pipeline.template.yaml > pipeline.yaml
scripts.test:prepare:earn:concrete: mustache config/earn-concrete/networks/mainnet.json config/earn-concrete/subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/earn-concrete/networks/mainnet.json config/earn-concrete/constants.template.ts > src/constants/static.ts && mustache config/earn-concrete/metadata.json config/earn-concrete/pipeline.template.yaml > pipeline.yaml
